DOC.brief_summary: Using a touch screen computer, the researchers are screening emergency department patients for intimate partner violence and mental health issues.
DOC.brief_title: Mental Health Symptoms and Intimate Partner Violence
DOC.detailed_description: Using a touch screen computer, the researchers are screening emergency department patients for intimate partner violence and mental health issues. The researchers are looking to see if those who participate in a computer screen and are given referral lists as well as having the computer printout placed on the physician clipboard, will increase physician awareness and recognition as well as patient use of resources compared to usual care.
DOC.criteria: Female patients between the ages of 1855 who present to the waiting room of the emergency department during study time periods Psychotic Acutely intoxicated Too ill to participate Unable to read Not English speaking
